Description:
PR case for Fosters LLP for a HSWA 2(1) PR -Trigger Case 4600951

TELEPHONE REPORT/EB - DP was taking down the wind tunnel that runs through the centre of the corn store. DP was
working on the ground when the wind tunnel collapsed on top of him. DP was working with another colleague, who
provided assistance and preformed CPR. Ambulance and Air Ambulance arrived on scene and provided assistance to
DP.
Offence Date: This case did result from the investigation of a fatality
Region: Hayesden Lane/J & D Foster FarJ Foster & SonFishponds FarmUpper Hayesden LaneTONBRIDGEKentTN11 8AAEngland
